data.name: Schoolgirl Strikers: Hair-raising! Unidentified Creature Spotted in the Snowy Mountains
data.short_description: Tsubame and the others get a day off as the dust has settled. Yuumi uses her connections to go to a hot spring deep in snow-covered mountains, and Mana and a few of the other girls set out to find a yeti. Little do they know there seems to be real evidence to support their existence.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
